DOC.brief_summary: It patent restriction filter device ventilatory nasal flow FeelBreathe aim increase nasal airflow resistance , therefore objective examine effect FeelBreathe lung ventilation gas exchange exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Feel Breathe , Restriction Device Ventilatory Nasal
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Different device currently use train inspiratory muscle , thus show increase physical performance . It control trial investigate effect new restriction filter device ventilatory nasal flow ( FeelBreathe ) . Methods : A total 27 trained male caucasian subject ( age : 32.5 Â± 7.23 year ) recruit different sport club . Measurement maximum static inspiratory pressure take exercise test incremental test cycle ergometer volitional fatigue determination gas exchange data . Each subject perform three identical submaximal exercise 50 % ventilatory threshold different breathe condition : 1 ) oronasal breathe 2 ) nasal breathe 3 ) nasal breathe Feel Breathe , Restriction Filtering Device Ventilatory Nasal Flow . Discussion : Researchers try find new device call FeelBreathe cause change lung ventilation gas exchange exercise . If result show altered breathing pattern cardiometabolic variable , FeelBreathe could use train respiratory muscle .
DOC.criteria: Age : 2535 year . train male caucasian cyclist Nonsmokers Each subject complete approve informed consent form detail health questionnaire testing . Smokers . Presence diseases test period . In particular , current symptom nasal disease , snore , asthma allergic rhinitis . Unwillingness complete study requirement .
